CustomField.formula: "&id=" + Id + CASE(RecordType.DeveloperName , 'Child_Performer_Services', '&templateid=a0nt0000000sArl' , 'Entertainment_Work', '&templateid=a0nt0000001be6B' , 'Janitorial', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Car_Wash', '&templateid=a0nt000000028Pd' , 'Talent_Agency', '&templateid=a0nt0000002BFkm' ,'')+ "&defaultpdf=1" + "&queryid=[Education]a0mt00000000sKw,[Disclaimer]a0mt00000001R1N?pv1=" + Record_Type_Name__c + ",[REG]a0mt00000000sKq,[Bond]a0mt00000000sKv,[Owner]a0mt00000000sKr,[Manager]a0mt00000000sKt, [Parent]a0mt0000000fs02, [Reglocation]a0mt00000000sKx,[FUQues]a0mt00000000sKu,[LiveScan]a0mt0000000J0z4,[Ques]a0mt00000000sKs,[Attach]a0mt00000000sKy,[Document]a0mt00000000sKp, [Trade]a0mt0000000J0uI" + "&congaemailtemplateid=a0lt0000000EWPD" + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Applicant_s_Email__c + "&EmailAdditionalTo=" + Account_Email__c + "&EmailFromID=0D2t0000000Gmid" + "&qmode=SendEmail" + "&SC0=1" + "&SC1=Attachments" + "&OFN=Registration for " + License_Registration_Number__c
CustomField.label: Send License Registration Permit PDF
